description: As the famously ripped and glowering Cornish copper miner, Aidan Turner has put the sex back  into Sunday nights.
title: Poldark returns: Aidan Turner on nudity, being single and why he's a technophobe

author: BBC Sport
description: American Gervonta Davis defends his IBF super-featherweight title by stopping Britain's Liam Walsh in round three at London's Copper Box.
title: Gervonta Davis retains IBF super-featherweight title by stopping Liam Walsh
